  • Method Details

    • apply

      public R apply​(R sourceRecord)
      Transforms database entries in Kafka events.

      Only insert or in case of a debezium failure replay operations are transformed.
      Each database entry is extend by a timestamp by debezium.
      The CustomTransformation class is only configured to parse the outbox table during startup. Therefor the columns of the database entry are known. The eventId column is added as an event header to allow fast routing of events. The aggregate_id and event_type column are used to generate the event key while the partition key is generated using root_aggregate_type column. For the generation of the partition key the number of partition for the event topic is needed. The event topic is the value in the root_aggregate_type column and the partition number is parsed using a zookeeper client. Additionally the event value is generated. The event value consists of the values of the columns event_type, version, ts_ms, aggregate_type and payload

      Specified by:
      apply in interface org.apache.kafka.connect.transforms.Transformation<R extends org.apache.kafka.connect.connector.ConnectRecord<R>>
      Parameters:
      sourceRecord - the source record
      Returns:
      the transformed source record

    • initZooKeeper

      public static void initZooKeeper() throws java.io.IOException
      Initializes a new zookeeper client if no client exits and registers a debezium zookeeper watcher.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the connection to the zookeeper server cannot be established.
      See Also:
      DebeziumZooKeeperWatcher

    • closeZooKeeper

      public static void closeZooKeeper() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Closes the zookeeper client.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if the connection to the zookeeper server is not successfully closed.

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the debezium transformer.

      Calls the closeZooKeeper() method to free the used resources.

      Specified by:
      close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
      Specified by:
